document.full_text: "american idol" host ryan seacrest is in early talks with nbc to do a music-themed show that he promises will not compete with the fox juggernaut.
document.title: "idol" host ryan seacrest preps music show for nbc
lines_and_colors: "american idol" host ryan seacrest is in early talks with nbc to do a music-themed show that he promises will not compete with the fox juggernaut.
